sentences.english: Substitute ego, also substitute the month imperial concubine who is silly to wait that person in the chilly temple.
sentences.chinese: 替自己，也替那個在冷宮裏傻傻等着那一人的月妃。

sentences.english: This single-mindedness seems to leave little room for romance or procreation.
sentences.chinese: 這種執著似乎也把戀愛生子打入了冷宮。

sentences.english: The mini-skirt caught on quickly but disappeared equally fast.
sentences.chinese: 迷你裙迅即流行，但是很快就被打入冷宮。
